bibl.title: City Planning?
bibl.note: The shape of Alexandria and certain important points were fixed by Alexander the Great. It was not foreseen in what way the new royal city would develop.

bibl.title: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993

bibl.seg: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993 (Malibu, 1996) pp. 55-74, 15 figg.
The shape of Alexandria and certain important points were fixed by Alexander the Great. It was not foreseen in what way the new royal city would develop.
